sentences.en: A Thai architect took his love for elephants and designed a luxury residence and office building in the shape of a pachyderm.
sentences.cn: 一个泰国建筑师将其对大象的热爱兑现于以此厚皮类动物设计了这个住宅办公综合楼。

sentences.en: Soar high above Fantasyland aboard everyone s favorite pachyderm.
sentences.cn: 登上人见人爱的小飞象,在幻想世界的天空里展翅高飞.

words.tran_cn: 迟钝的人；厚脸皮的人；[脊椎]厚皮类动物

trans.tran_cn: 大的厚皮动物（如象和犀牛），<喻>厚脸皮的人，麻木不仁的人，迟钝的人
trans.tran_en: an animal with thick skin, such as an  elephant
